column1: * 1916 - J.R.R. Tolkien is shipped to France.
* 1949 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Pauline Baynes.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at wikipedia:Atlanta Symphony Hall
* 2007 - The Lord of the Rings: The Official Stage Companion is published.
* 2010 - Warner Bros. announce that The Lord of the Rings Online will become free-to-play.
